name: Bahia las Ballenas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although we did not manage to enjoy the beach due to bad weather, even just sitting on our veranda was a pleasure in such wonderful surroundings.
reviews.title: The most beautiful hotel in the area.

reviews.text: The hotel is like a village from a fairytale, the rooms very beautiful and spacious and the hotel staff is extremely friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Wonderful Paradise on Earth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurant is great as well as the restaurants of all the other hotels on the beach.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel very quiet place and nice beaches around
Wonderful Hotel, will return as soon as I can get some friends to come

aka: Bahia Las Ballenas Hotel Las Terrenas
description: The simple and elegant decoration of the cane roof bungalows along with the cool breeze of the sea and the enchanting scenery substitute the air conditioning and the television. Far from the joyous tumult of Las Terrenas, the hotel, provided with a roof made of cane, is built in a traditional style and combines comfort and ease with the exoticism and charms, the perfect place to get away and relax.
